name: matrix
description: Matrix is a CSS framework based on the CSS Grid Layout.

scripts.build: node-sass src/matrix.scss dist/matrix.css --source-map dist/matrix.css.map && npm run minify
scripts.watch: node-sass --watch src/matrix.scss dist/matrix.css --source-map dist/matrix.css.map & npm run minify
scripts.docs:sass: node-sass src/matrix.scss docs/css/matrix.css && node-sass docs/_scss/docs.scss docs/css/docs.css
scripts.serve:sass: node-sass --watch src/matrix.scss docs/css/matrix.css & node-sass --watch docs/_scss/docs.scss docs/css/docs.css

author: Maël Querré & Alex Dean
